maxIndex.details: this variable will inc when user added a withdraw in the queue       the NO. will never decrease

AddQueue(address,uint256).notice: An event emitted when user add queue

CancelQueue(address,uint256).notice: An event emitted when user cancel queue

ROOT_DB().notice: the address of  torn ROOT_DB contract

TORN_CONTRACT().notice: the address of  torn token contract

claim().notice: when the TORN is prepared call this function to claim*

executeQueue().notice: when there are enough TORN call this function the user waiting status would change to  prepared*

getQueueInfo(address).notice: get the queue infomation return v : the amount of voucher if  prepared == false  else the amount of TORN which can be claim prepared : prepared == true show that the TORN is prepared to claim*

nextSkipIndex().notice: because of cancel ,it will been some blank in the queue call this function to get the counter of  blank in the queue return 1. the number of blanks 2. INDEX_ERR  the he number of blanks is over MAX_QUEUE_CANCEL*

nextValue().notice: get the next user in queue waiting's TORN*

userdoc.notice: this is a simple queue for user exit when  liquidity shortage is not enough. 1. inorder to save gas the code is not easy to understand ,it need same patience 2. if preparedIndex >= addr2index[user_address] , it indicate the TORN is prepared 3. in the waiting ,user can cancel his waiting 4. user at most  add one withdraw in the queue
